HomePage.title: Master Languages Through Interactive Dictation
HomePage.description: Create personalized dictation games to enhance vocabulary learning across multiple languages. Perfect for educators and language learners.

Features.sectionDescription: Our platform offers a comprehensive set of tools to make language learning engaging, personalized, and effective.

smartLearning.title: Smart Learning
smartLearning.description: Our AI-powered system adapts to your learning style and progress, ensuring optimal retention and advancement.

multilingualSupport.title: Multilingual Support
multilingualSupport.description: Learn and practice in over 12 languages with native speaker pronunciations and cultural nuances.

progressTracking.title: Progress Tracking
progressTracking.description: Monitor your improvement with detailed statistics and analytics on your learning journey.

audioRecognition.title: Audio Recognition
audioRecognition.description: Practice speaking and listening with our advanced speech recognition technology.

multiplayerMode.title: Multiplayer Mode
multiplayerMode.description: Compete with friends or join language learning communities to enhance motivation.

vocabularyBuilding.title: Vocabulary Building
vocabularyBuilding.description: Expand your vocabulary with context-based learning and spaced repetition techniques.

HowItWorks.sectionSubtitle: Three Simple Steps to Language Mastery
HowItWorks.sectionDescription: Our platform makes it easy to create, practice, and master language skills through interactive dictation games.

step1.title: Create Your Dictation Game
step1.description: Set up a personalized dictation game by selecting languages and adding word pairs with example sentences.

step2.title: Add Words and Phrases
step2.description: Build your vocabulary list manually or use our AI-powered tools to generate content from texts or images.

step3.title: Play and Practice
step3.description: Start playing in writing or quiz mode to practice and reinforce your language skills.

LatestGames.title: Latest Dictation Games
LatestGames.description: Check out the most recent public dictation games created by our community.
